Uses of Class
org.eng.aisp.classifier.ConfusionMatrix

  • Packages that use ConfusionMatrix 
    Package Description
    org.eng.aisp.classifier
    Defines a general framework for training on and classifying data streams.
    org.eng.aisp.tools
    Provides a set of command line tools for training, classifying, capturing, and storing sounds.
